movies.title: Iron Man
movies.description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

movies.title: The Incredible Hulk
movies.description: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.

movies.title: Iron Man 2
movies.description: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

movies.title: Thor
movies.description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

movies.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
movies.description: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a 'Super-Soldier serum'. But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movies.title: Iron Man 3
movies.description: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

movies.title: Thor: The Dark World
movies.description: When the Dark Elves attempt to plunge the universe into darkness, Thor must embark on a perilous and personal journey that will reunite him with Jane Foster and force him to sacrifice everything to save us all.

movies.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
movies.description: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.description: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

movies.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
movies.description: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong, and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.

movies.title: Ant-Man
movies.description: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.

movies.title: Captain America: Civil War
movies.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

movies.title: Doctor Strange
movies.description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
movies.description: The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quill's true parentage.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.description: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

movies.title: Thor: Ragnarok
movies.description: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the ruthless Hela.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and confront a challenger from his country's past.

movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

movies.title: Ant-Man and The Wasp
movies.description: As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.

movies.title: Captain Marvel
movies.description: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
movies.description: Following the events of Avengers: Endgame, Spider-Man must step up to take on new threats in a world that has changed forever.

movies.title: Black Widow
movies.description: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.

movies.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
movies.description: Shang-Chi must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.

movies.title: Eternals
movies.description: The Eternals, a race of immortal beings, reunite to protect Earth from their enemies, the Deviants.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: Peter Parker's world is turned upside down when he is unmasked and his identity as Spider-Man is revealed, leading him on a perilous journey to reclaim his life and face his greatest adversaries.

actors.name: Robert Downey Jr.
actors.bio: Robert Downey Jr. is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Tony Stark/Iron Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Gwyneth Paltrow
actors.bio: Gwyneth Paltrow is an American actress. She portrayed the character Pepper Potts in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Terrence Howard
actors.bio: Terrence Howard is an American actor. He played the role of James Rhodes in the movie Iron Man.

actors.name: Edward Norton
actors.bio: Edward Norton is an American actor. He portrayed the character Bruce Banner/The Hulk in The Incredible Hulk.

actors.name: Liv Tyler
actors.bio: Liv Tyler is an American actress. She played the role of Betty Ross in The Incredible Hulk.

actors.name: Tim Roth
actors.bio: Tim Roth is an English actor. He portrayed the character Emil Blonsky/Abomination in The Incredible Hulk.

actors.name: Mickey Rourke
actors.bio: Mickey Rourke is an American actor. He played the role of Ivan Vanko/Whiplash in Iron Man 2.

actors.name: Chris Hemsworth
actors.bio: Chris Hemsworth is an Australian actor. He portrayed the character Thor Odinson in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Natalie Portman
actors.bio: Natalie Portman is an Israeli-American actress. She played the role of Jane Foster in the Thor movies.

actors.name: Tom Hiddleston
actors.bio: Tom Hiddleston is an English actor. He portrayed the character Loki in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Chris Evans
actors.bio: Chris Evans is an American actor. He played the role of Steve Rogers/Captain America in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Hayley Atwell
actors.bio: Hayley Atwell is a British-American actress. She portrayed the character Peggy Carter in the Captain America movies.

actors.name: Hugo Weaving
actors.bio: Hugo Weaving is an Australian actor. He played the role of Johann Schmidt/Red Skull in Captain America: The First Avenger.

actors.name: Mark Ruffalo
actors.bio: Mark Ruffalo is an American actor. He portrayed the character Bruce Banner/The Hulk in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Scarlett Johansson
actors.bio: Scarlett Johansson is an American actress. She played the role of Natasha Romanoff/Black Widow in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Jeremy Renner
actors.bio: Jeremy Renner is an American actor. He portrayed the character Clint Barton/Hawkeye in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Samuel L. Jackson
actors.bio: Samuel L. Jackson is an American actor. He played the role of Nick Fury in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Tommy Lee Jones
actors.bio: Tommy Lee Jones is an American actor. He portrayed the character Chester Phillips in Captain America: The First Avenger.

actors.name: Chris Pratt
actors.bio: Chris Pratt is an American actor. He played the role of Peter Quill/Star-Lord in the Guardians of the Galaxy movies.

actors.name: Benedict Cumberbatch
actors.bio: Benedict Cumberbatch is an English actor. He portrayed the character Stephen Strange/Doctor Strange in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Chadwick Boseman
actors.bio: Chadwick Boseman was an American actor. He played the role of T'Challa/Black Panther in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Brie Larson
actors.bio: Brie Larson is an American actress. She portrayed the character Carol Danvers/Captain Marvel in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Paul Rudd
actors.bio: Paul Rudd is an American actor. He portrayed the character Scott Lang/Ant-Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Sebastian Stan
actors.bio: Sebastian Stan is a Romanian-American actor. He played the role of Bucky Barnes/Winter Soldier in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Anthony Mackie
actors.bio: Anthony Mackie is an American actor. He portrayed the character Sam Wilson/Falcon in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Elizabeth Olsen
actors.bio: Elizabeth Olsen is an American actress. She played the role of Wanda Maximoff/Scarlet Witch in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

actors.name: Paul Bettany
actors.bio: Paul Bettany is an English actor. He portrayed the character Vision in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
